comment._content: The Luftwaffe commissioned all the French aircraft into the service immediately after the whole of France was conquered by Germany, right?

comment._content: Was it because some of the aircraft were totally unfit for combat?

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/61468181@N04] Yes, and many were used for training and not combat.
